name: Millennial HR
description: Millennial HR is a consultancy service that is structured to offer Human Resources (HR) and Organisational Development (OD) solutions to diverse clients. We assist organisations to design and employ HR strategies that appeal to different generations at the workplace to motivate high-performing teams. Working closely with our clients, we seek to create solutions that are not only affordable to employers but are meaningful to employees and ultimately create an enabling work environment for employees to do their best work. We take pride in creating gigs, linking employers with high-calibre candidates, and supporting diverse employees with skills and competencies necessary to maximise their potential. Our ultimate goal is to empower employees to take charge of their careers and grow, succeed and thrive.
